main event: An observer reported a possible UFO sighting at Blytheville AFB, Arkansas, on November 8, 1957, estimated to be observed for approximately 65 minutes.
interesting points: The object was tracked on radar with speeds reported between 1,000-1,500 mph., The observer believed it was a satellite (ECHO II) and saw it multiple times., No physical evidence was found related to the sighting., The observer was a USAF control tower operator with 10 years of experience., Other personnel at Blytheville AFB were notified immediately about the sighting.
witness description: James G. Horgland, AIC; Horace F. Gan, both military personnel.
